attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned having been denied a say on the European Union and in an expression of condemnation of Government
Policies that have seriously damaged our Nation State, Culture, and National well-being, do hereby register a Vote of No Confidence in the Government. 

Furtherto, the Government having demonstrated a breach of Public Trust we call upon the Government to undertake to provide the British People with Direct Democracy, that is, the Right of Referenda on all major issues that affect our National Sovereignty, Rights and Freedoms.

In addition we completely reject the division this Country's administrative control into regions centred in Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
